metadata.Title: CVE-2021-25786 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in QPDF version 10.0.4, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted .pdf file to Pl_ASCII85Decoder::write parameter in libqpdf.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-25786` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libqpdf26 - 9.1.1-1ubuntu0.1
qpdf - 9.1.1-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This appears to be a dupe of CVE-2021-36978, same bug and fix commits. Updating as such.

criterions.comment: qpdf package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '9.1.1-1ubuntu0.1').
